transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Vivek bataiye
Customer: Haan ji Anurag ji baat kare
Executive: Ji bataiye
Customer: Ji Anurag ji main Suraj baat kar raha sir senior manager India Mart se
Executive: Haan ji bataiye
Customer: Ji abhi aapka concern ek aaya hua hai dobara se account manager change ke regarding
Executive: kya karne ke liye
Customer: Account manager change ke regarding aapne kiya 9696 pe
Customer: Haan haan
Executive: Ji bilkul ji hai na
Customer: Ji ji abhi to meri baat hui thi sir aapse parso narso mein
Executive: Parso narso aapse baat hui thi
Customer: Bilkul abhi to hui thi sir
Executive: Kya baat hui thi aapse
Customer: Product ke regarding baat hui thi sir aapki video meeting hui thi aapki team ke sath jo aapke account manager
Executive: Kis bare mein kis bare mein baat hui thi ye to bata do
Customer: Product ke regarding baat hui thi kuch product update vagera karwane the
Customer: Haan kar diya hoga fir aapne parso se abhi tak
Customer: Haan ji
Executive: Product update ho gaye the parso se aaj tak
Customer: Definitely sir kaam to chal hi raha hoga team bhi kaam kar rahi hai aapke manager aapke
Executive: koi product mein hath nahi lagaya touch nahi kari us din se aaj tak jab aaj maine baith ke meeting mein maine karwaya dusre se
Customer: Kisse sir
Executive: Customer customer care pe call karke unse direct karwaya maine un team se aaj
Customer: Customer care pe call karke
Customer: Haan unse karwaya maine aaj ji aur wo bhi Nikita Jadhav unse dekh lo unko chala hoga usne aaj tak pura unse pura mujhe karana pada pura product sab kuch add karaya aaj
Customer: Matlab kya nikla mera us din itne din mein itne ghante behas kari ghante aadha ghante diya tha aap pe bhi un pe bhi koi sense nikla kya baat hui thi last mein meri unse unne kaha tha main kar dungi chalo bhai aapka duty time khatam ho gaya man lo 6 baj gaye to bhai agle din duty shuru nahi hui aapki Friday ko
Executive: Hmm bilkul sahi keh rahe hain
Customer: Aur fir aaj ka Saturday nikalne ja raha pura din aaj bhi aapko bilkul wo nahi aaya yaad jab mere us baat pe behas kis baat pe ho rahi thi us din
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm hmm
Customer: Main aapko call kis liye kiya tha aapko bhi to yaad hoga na kis liye call kiya tha
Executive: Bilkul sir maine abhi aapko ek cheez boli thi aapko
Customer: Dhyan hoga ki sir thoda sa time dijiyega mujhe aap hai na wo closing chal rahi thi to isliye maine aapko bola tha
Executive: Bhai main aapko aapko time kyun lu mera manager ek baat batao main aapke manager se baat karunga aapne aapka aur mera kitna acche se healthy baat hui koi problem nahi hai sir
Executive: Bilkul bilkul
Customer: Maine aapse yahi kaha tha ki aapke jo account manager mere account ke liye hain unka kaam jo hai wo kyun nahi kar rahe hain bhai unki bhi fir call aayi maine kaha unko bhi yahi kaha tha main manage kar lena bole theek hai ho jayega to specific manager jante hain jinko aap matlab matlab keh sakte hain ki main unko rakh lu
Customer: Last time mere aap baat kar rahe the ki aapke theek Varshi Verma
Executive: Haan agar wo to kar do abhi maine unse bhi bulaya Nikita Jadhav jo thi aaj maine unse bhi bola agar aapko aasan ho sakta hai to kar dijiye
Executive: Main try karta hu sir theek hai
Customer: Magar unka kehna tha customer care mein pata nahi aisa bol rahi thi wo
Executive: Nahi nahi main theek hai main kar deta hu
Customer: No
Executive: Haan main try karta hu theek hai
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's product updates not done yet.

- Account manager not doing his work.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to resolve the issue.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- product update, account manager, customer care
